Question: GTR Simulator CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
GTR Simulator

Product Highlights:

- RS30 Ultra Wheel with Force Feedback
- V3 Pro Racing Pedals with adjustable options
- RH3 Hand Brake with automatic calibration
- RSH3 7+1 Gated Shifter for PC
- GTM Motion Racing Simulator with leading motion technology
- GTA™ Revolution Racing Simulator with unparalleled rigidity and stability
- GTA™ Model Racing Simulator with adjustable design
- GTSF Model Racing Simulator with 3D & Augmented Reality experience
- GTR-F sport seat with lateral stitching and GTR lettering
- Optional equipment available
- Developed by professional racers
- Address: 1004 Brooks St. Ontario, CA 91762
- Contact: +1-888-9GTRSIM, info@gtrsim.com

- GTM动感赛车模拟器，引领运动技术
- GTA™革命赛车模拟器，构造坚固稳定
- GTA™经典赛车模拟器，可调节设计
- GTSF全息立体体验赛车模拟器
- GTR-F运动座椅，配有侧缝线和GTR字母标识
- 可选设备可供选择
